short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your Gmail account to sync your game progress across devices, and open the game using the extension button on the extension bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync your Cookie Clicker progress across all your devices seamlessly by linking your Gmail account with the game. This feature allows you to save your progress and pick up right where you left off, regardless of which device you use. Plus, accessing Cookie Clicker is made easy with the extension button on your browser's extension bar. Simply click the button to quickly launch Cookie Clicker without having to navigate to it manually
